meanings.definition: The posterior lobe of the pituitary gland, which secretes hormones such as oxytocin and vasopressin.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the neurohypophysis to understand hormone secretion.
meanings.sent3: The neurohypophysis decided to throw a hormone party.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like the neurohypophysis, releasing oxytocin in abundance.
meanings.sent5: The neurohypophysis, like a tiny hormone factory, works tirelessly in the body.
